definition: a position on a basketball, soccer, or hockey team, send or ship onward from an intermediate post or station in transit, in a forward direction, at or near or directed toward the front
details:
noun
- a position on a basketball, soccer, or hockey team
- the person who plays the position of forward in certain games, such as basketball, soccer, or hockey
verb
- send or ship onward from an intermediate post or station in transit
= example: send or ship onward from an intermediate post or station in transit
= synonyms: send on
adverb
- in a forward direction
= synonyms: forwards
- at or to or toward the front
= example: at or to or toward the front
= synonyms: forwards
- toward the future
= example: toward the future
= synonyms: ahead
- forward in time or order or degree
= synonyms: onward
- near or toward the bow of a ship or cockpit of a plane
= example: near or toward the bow of a ship or cockpit of a plane
= synonyms: fore
adjective
- at or near or directed toward the front
= example: at or near or directed toward the front
- of the transmission gear causing forward movement in a motor vehicle
= example: of the transmission gear causing forward movement in a motor vehicle
- used of temperament or behavior
- moving forward
= synonyms: advancing, forward-moving
